Trait description: Anthesis or flowering time is the period during which a flower is fully open and functional. Pollination and fertilization occur during this period.
Method description: Count the number of days after sowing until 50% of the plants have one or more flowers
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: V-shaped chlorotic to necrotic foliar lesions,vascular blackening, Light colored, raised pustules which can coalesce into brown lesions, caused by Xanthomonas sp.
Method description: visual assessment of 1-5 affected plants with bacterial pustule
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Tan and reddish brown lesions on leaves, pods or whole plant caused by Phakopsora Pachyrhizi
Method description: Visual assessment of 1-5 affected plants with rust
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Stunting of plants and crinkled and mottling of leaves
Method description: Visual assessment of 1-5 affected plants / plot
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Tan or brown, elliptical lesions with brown purple boarder on plant parts caused by Cercospora Sojina
Method description: Visual assessment of 1-5 affected leaf area with frog eye
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Root nodule formation due to interaction with microorganisms.
Method description: Visual assessment of the proportion of nodules
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Large galls or knots on the root system caused by Meloidogyne Spp
Method description: Visual assessment of 1-5 of nematode knots
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time when pods have changed to final color.
Method description: Determine the number of days elapsed between sowing and when the pods have reached maturity
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Height from soil surface to first pod
Method description: Length of stem
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Height of the plant i.e., the length from the soil surface to top main stem (not petioles and leaves) node
Method description: Length of the plant at harvest
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Tendency of plant to lodge
Method description: Estimate the proportion of plants lodged i.e., protrated on the ground
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit
Category 2: 2=All plants leaning slightly or a few plants down
Category 3: 3=All plants leaning moderately (45 degrees), or 25% - 50% of plants down
Category 4: 4= All plants leaning considerably, or 50% - 80% of plants down

Trait description: The number of plants harvested contributing to the yield
Method name: Number of plants harvested in the net plot, excluding the borders
Method description: Number of plants harvested in the net plot, excluding the borders
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Yield of a soybean field in terms of seed weight per unit area at a specified moisture content.
Method description: Weigh the amount of harvested grains (excluding the borders) adjusted to 13% moisture,
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Weight of harvested fodder i.e., haulm, stover per unit of area
Method description: Measure the dry weight of stover, haulm harvested after threshing plants harvested from the plot excluing the borders.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Proportion of open pods at harvest
Method description: Estimate the proportion of open pods at harvest by shattering the pods left on the 1m at both ends of the plot after the net yield plot was harvested
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Proportion of open pods
Method description: Estimate the proportion of open pods at harvest by shattering the pods left on the 1m at both ends of the plot after the net yield plot was harvested
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Capacity of a seed to emerge when planted after being stored during a given amount of time.
Method description: Count the number of seedlings emerged after 8 months in storage out of 100 planted seeds
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Oil content of soybean seed
Method name: Seed oil content measurement in the lab
Method description: Weigh the amount of extracted oil from seed after harvest and divide by the seed dry weight
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Protein content of seed
Method description: After harvest, measure the protein content of the seed on a dry weight basis
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The reaction of the plant or plant part to damage caused by Aphis glycines feeding.
Method description: Observe the plant parts that are yellowing and/or curling
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Tendency of plant to form primary branches
Method description: At maturity, observe the abundance of primary branches
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time between the beginning of flowering (R1) and full maturity (R8)
Method description: Count number of days from beginning of bloom (R1) to full maturity(R8)
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Color of the flower petals
Method description: At flowering, observe the color of flower
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Length of the pod from the calyx to the pod tip in cm or mm
Method description: Measure length of pod from caylx to pod tip using a length measuring instrument
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time when soybean twines
Method description: Take note of the date when 50% of plants are twining
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Response of plant to inundation by water of all or part of the plant
Method description: Appearance of plants in response to flooding
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Reduction in chlorophyll in a plant or plant part as a result of nutrient deficiency
Method description: Measurement chlorophyll content using a SPAD meter and then compare to a reference
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Resistance to damage by water restriction.
Method description: Appearance of plants in response to limited water availability
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Reaction of the plant or plant part to herbicide exposure
Method description: Appearance of plants in response to herbicides sprayed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Ratio of oil content to protein content of the seed
Method name: Oil content to protein content ratio
Method description: Divide the oil content by the protein content. For this calculation, the oil and protein contents must be expressed in the same unit
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time when the seed grows in size and weight i.e., the period characterized by the beginning of R4 (full pod) and the end of R6 (full seed).
Method description: Count number of days from full pod(R4) to full seed(R6) stages of growth
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Color of the pod.
Method description: Take note of the color of the mature pod which are black, tan, brown and grey
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Color of the soybean seed hilum (scar on the ovule produced by abscision of funiculus)
Method description: Observe the colour of the hilum
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit
Category 3: 3=Blbr= Black hilum with brown outer ring,

Trait description: Overall quality of the seed based on defective seed coat, greenish or diseased seeds
Method description: Visual assessment of seed quality
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Resistance of a plant or plant part to damage by lower than normal temperatures
Method description: Appearance of plant or plant part in low temperature weather
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Resistance of a plant or plant part to damage by higher than normal temperatures
Method description: Appearance of plant or plant part in high temperature weather
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Linoleic acid content of the seed oil i.e., linoleic acid weight per total oil weight of the seed
Trait synonyms: Linoleic acid, LA, C18:2, octadecadienoic acid
Method description: Measure the content of linoleic acid in the oil extracted from the seed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Linolenic acid content of the seed oil i.e., linolenic acid weight per total oil weight of the seed
Trait synonyms: Linolenic acid, ALA, alpha-lenolenic acid, C18:3
Method description: Measure the content of linolenic acid in the oil extracted from the seed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Palmitic acid content of the seed oil i.e., palmitic acid weight per total oil weight of the seed
Method description: Measure the content of palmitic acid in the oil extracted from the seed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Oleic acid content of the seed oil i.e., palmitic acid weight per total oil weight of the seed
Trait synonyms: Oleic acid, 18:1 n-9, C18:1 n9, octadecanoic acid
Method description: Measure the content of oleic acid in the oil extracted from the seed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of total soybean seed protein that is composed of methionine
Method description: Measure the weight of methionine extracted from the seed sample and divide by the weight of protein extracted from the same sample.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Stearic acid content of the seed oil i.e., stearic acid weight per total oil weight of the seed
Trait synonyms: Stearic, C18:0, octadecoic acid, octadecanoic acid
Method description: Measure the content of stearic acid in the oil extracted from the seed
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Termination type of the axial growth of a soybean plant.
Method description: Observe tapering of stem tip and presence or absence of terminal raceme.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Foliar feeding damage caused by beet armyworm(Spodoptera exigua)
Method description: Visual assessment on the percentage of leaves eaten up by beet armyworm on a scale of 1 to 5
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Defoliation by chewing insects
Method description: Visuall assessment of the leaves eaten up by chewing insects
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Proportion of open pods 2 weeks after harvest
Method description: Visual assessment of pod opening 2weeks after harvest
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Proportion of open pods
Method description: Visual assessment of pod opening 2weeks after harvest
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The color of soybean pubescence.
Method description: Note colors of pubescence which include tawny, light tawny, near-grey and grey.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Maturity group designation of a germplasm.
Method description: Relative classification based on maturity of cultivars in known maturity group
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Surface of the seed coat discolored by mottling i.e. , the additional pigmentation that is observed on lines with yellow or green seed coats
Method description: Observe the color of the seed coat
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of total soybean seed protein that is composed of lysine
Method description: Measure the weight of lysine extracted from the seed sample and divide by the weight of protein extracted from the same sample.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of chlorophyll normally found in a plant under normal environmental conditions
Method description: Measure chlorophyll using a SPAD meter
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The total isoflavone content of a seed.
Method description: Measurement of the amount of isoflavone out of seed weight
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time from planting soybean seed until hypocotyl emerges from the substrate
Method description: Number of days from planting to emergence(VE)
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The number of flowers produced by a plant
Method description: Number of flowers per plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Distance from growing medium to the top leaves
Method description: Wooden lath placed on each plot to measure average height above ground
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Days from planting when there is an open flower on any node on the main stem
Method description: Number of days from emergence to beginning of bloom (R1)
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Anthesis or flowering time is the period during which a flower is fully open and functional. Pollination and fertilization occur during this period.
Method description: Number of days from emergence to beginning of bloom (R1)
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The number of nodule on the root system usually compared to wild type
Method description: Count the number of nodules on a plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Number of days past planting when pods are mature. This trait is synonymous with seed pod maturity.Maturity defined as pods have reached their final color.
Method description: Count days from planting to pod maturity R8
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Number of days past planting when 95% of pods have reached their mature color.
Method description: Count days from planting to 95% pod maturity R8
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Time when pods have changed to final color.
Method description: Count days from planting to 95% pod maturity R8
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Weight of root nodules
Method description: Dig out, dry and weigh root nodules
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The shape of the primary root at a stipulated range of the root
Method description: Visually examine the primary root shape
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The diameter of the main root measured at a stipulated level of the root
Method description: Using a callipers measure diameter of primary root at stipulated point
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The number of leaves (petioles) originating from a node on a stem
Method description: Count Physically the number of leaves on a plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The diameter of the main stem of soybean plant
Method description: The average measurement with calipers midway between the unifoliate and the first trifoliate nodes for three mature plants per plot
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of fiber in soybean seed
Method description: Measurement of the amount of fibre out of seed weight
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of moisture of a mature seed
Method description: Measurement of the moisture content of a mature seed of seed at harvest
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of total seed soluble carbohydrates that is sucrose.
Method description: Measure amount of total seed soluble carbohydrates that is sucrose
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Reaction of the plant or plant part to Peronospora manchurica infection.
Method description: Look at how much of the plant or plant part is covered with small, discrete, pale to bright yellow spots
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Reaction of the plant or plant part to infection by Colletotrichum dematiu
Method description: How much or the plant or plant part has been affected by irregulary shaped brown areas and/or black fruiting bodies on infected areas
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The diameter of a lateral root measured at the proximal end of the root
Method description: Using a callipers measure diameter of lateral root at stipulated point
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The shape of the lateral root at a stipulated range of the roots
Method description: Visually observe the shape of the lateral root
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The amount of total seed soluble carbohydrates that is stachyose.
Method description: Measure amount of total seed soluble carbohydrates that is stachyose.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Raffinose content of a plant or plant part.
Method description: Measure amount of total seed soluble carbohydrates that is raffinose
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The shape of the leaflet. Remark: This trait has been incorrectly called Leaf shape"."
Method description: Elliptic Fourier descriptor measures 5 components, including aspect ratio of leaflet shape, location of centroid of leaflets along midrib, straightness or distortion of leaflet shape, and roundness of leaflet shape. Measured on central leaflets of fully expanded leaflets. Can also be measured as the ratio of leaflet width to leaflet length from upper third of plant.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Orientation of pubescence, generally on the leaf surface but pubsecence can be found on the stem
Method description: Observation of the type of pubescence
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: The form of the tip of a soybean pubescence
Method description: Observation of the type of the tip of the pubescence on the plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Form of a flower.
Method description: Observe the form of a flower at the final development stage
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Presence or absence of pubescence on soybean plant
Method description: observation of presence or absence of trichome on the plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Number of pods per plant
Method description: count number of Pods on a plant
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Number of seed per pod sampled
Method description: count the number of seeds on a pod
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Weight of the seed
Method description: Weigh 100 seeds
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Reaction of the plant or plant part to infection by Cercopsora species.
Method description: Number and density of spot on leaves
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Yield of a soybean field in terms of seed weight per unit area at a specified moisture content.
Method description: Weigh the amount of harvested grains (excluding the borders) adjusted to 13% moisture, and then divided by the area of the plot
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Weight of harvested fodder i.e., haulm, stover per unit of area
Method description: Measure the dry weight of stover, haulm harvested after threshing plants harvested from the plot excluing the borders. Then divide the measured harvested weight by the effectively harvested area of the plot
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Root nodule formation due to interaction with microorganisms.
Method description: Visual assessment of the presence of nodulation

Trait description: The shape of the leaflet. Remark: This trait has been incorrectly called Leaf shape"."
Method description: Elliptic Fourier descriptor measures 5 components, including aspect ratio of leaflet shape, location of centroid of leaflets along midrib, straightness or distortion of leaflet shape, and roundness of leaflet shape. Measured on central leaflets of fully expanded leaflets. Can also be measured as the ratio of leaflet width to leaflet length from upper third of plant.
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit

Trait description: Orientation of pubescence on the surface of the leaflet
Method description: Observation of the type of pubescence
Method reference: Soybean USDA description database, Soybase database, OboEdit
